sentences.en: Executionstake place in extreme secrecy under the auspices of the Justice Ministry.
sentences.cn: 死刑的执行在法务省的主持下极度秘密.

sentences.en: Its auspices, dubbing the program has won national awards in China.
sentences.cn: 其主持配音的节目多次获得中国全国奖项.

sentences.en: Its entertainment, professional organizers had repeatedly agreed to allow the auspices of the candidates and guests.
sentences.cn: 其娱乐性 、 专业性一度让主办方反复商定主持及嘉宾人选.

sentences.en: The association is under the auspices of World Bank.
sentences.cn: 这个组织是在世界银行的赞助下办的.

sentences.en: The auspices of growing soft capacity, and more outstanding programs, internships are overand for formal employment.
sentences.cn: 柔的主持本领越来越强, 节目越来越杰出, 操练的日子竣事,得到正式的聘任.

sentences.en: The committee began its work under unfavourable auspices.
sentences.cn: 委员会工作伊始即十分不利.

sentences.en: The concert was under the auspices of various companies.
sentences.cn: 这次音乐会得到了多家公司的赞助.

sentences.en: The crane, on being wounded, said, " Prophetic crow, where now are your auspices? "
sentences.cn: 鹤受了伤, 说道: “ 预言者乌鸦, 这一次你的预兆 呢 ? ”

sentences.en: The lecture was given under the auspices of the Academy of Sciences.
sentences.cn: 这次报告会是由科学院主办的.

sentences.en: The tournament was held under the auspices of the city council .
sentences.cn: 锦标赛在世议会的赞助下开幕了。

sentences.en: The tournament was held under the auspices of the city council.
sentences.cn: 这次锦标赛是在市议会的赞助下举办的.

sentences.en: This college was founded under the auspices of an overseas Chinese.
sentences.cn: 这所学院是由一位华侨赞助创办的.

sentences.en: This concert has been arranged under the auspices of the Knight Group.
sentences.cn: 这次音乐会是由奈特集团赞助举办的.

sentences.en: This concert has been arranged under the auspices of the Queen.
sentences.cn: 这次音乐会是由女王赞助举办的.

sentences.en: This standard is issued by NACE International under the auspices of STG 34.
sentences.cn: 本标准在特别技术小组34协助下由NACE国际发行.

sentences.en: Whether these economic developments could have occurred under different political auspices can only be guessed at.
sentences.cn: 至于在不同的政治气候下是否会出现这种经济的发展,那只能任各人揣度了.

phrases.tran_cn: 由…赞助或主办，在……保护下；在…的主持下；在…保护下

trans.tran_cn: 主办，赞助，支持，保护，鸟卜者，预兆
